title: How was the ANTHE 2019 class 8? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am the right person to answer this question. My younger brother gave ANTHE’19 for 8th Standard and he was pretty happy with his performance as well as the question paper. He appeared in CBT mode and found everything at ease. As per him, 10% of questions were tricky but 90% were in a straightway format. We are hoping the best for his rank though.

Anthe 2019 Class 8 was easy, but some questions in Maths got really tricky in my opinion. I may score 284/360 according to the answer key. Can you reply which rank I may get? Can I get less than 100 rank?
